channel.title: ((New) Static Site Generation)
channel.description: Migration from Hugo to org-mode, some scripts, and pandoc

div.p: For a few years, I've been using Hugo for blog generation. Recently, I've decided I wanted to take static site generation into a different direction. Specifically, I wanted to use a different source markup and I wanted to write my own tool set for generating the actual HTML.

channel.p: We'll walk through the motivation of changing the content into a different format and changing the generation process into a completely custom set of scripts.
